accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

controlaccess.corpname: Amalgamated Lithographers of America. Local 1 (New York)
Federation of Dyers, Finishers, Printers and Bleachers of America
International Union of Mine, Mill, and Smelter Workers
International Union, United Automobile Workers of America (CIO)
United Farm Equipment and Metal Workers of America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; Steel Workers Organizing Committee, CIO ; CIO ; International Union United Automobile Workers of America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Federation of Dyers, Finishers Printers & Bleachers of America ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; CIO

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: CIO ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; United Rubber Workers of America ; International Union United Automobile Workers of America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: CIO ; United Farm Equipment & Metal Workers of America ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1947-1948, 1950, 1960, unknown. CIO ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America ; United Steelworkers of America ; Amalgamated Lithographers of America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "Our Shirt for Roosevelt" ; Krzycki for Congress ; United Textile Workers of America ; United Farm Equipment & Metal Workers of America

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Michigan Labor Welcomes Mandela Freedom Tour 1990 ; American Slav Congress United for Victory ; Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America (badge) Biennial Convention, May 1966, Delegate (ribbons are torn and faded) ; Za-Odre-NYSE-Baltyk (pendant on a blue and white ribbon)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Delegate - 10th Convention - UAW-CIO Atlantic City March 23, 1946 (Andrew J. Ignash, LU600 - Dearborn) ; Delegate - Michigan CIO Council Seventh Annual Convention, July 12-16, 1944 (Andrew J. Ignasiak - #600 UAW Detroit) ; Visitor - 8th Annual convention Michigan State CIO Council Detroit - June 10-11, 1946 ; Visitor - June 11,12,13 & 14, 1956, Grand Rapids, Michigan ; Guest - First Convention, AFL-CIO - New York City Dec. 5, 1955

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Alternate Delegate, 7th Annual Convention - UAW CIO - Chicago, Ill. - August 3rd, 1942 ; Delegate - 17th Constitutional Convention ; Polish American Club of So. Manchester, Conn. - Organized 1916 ; International Rep. - 16th Convention - UAW-CIO, Cleveland, Ohio - April 1-7, 1951 ; Visitor - Eleventh Annual Convention - Michigan State - CIO Council, Grand Rapids, Mich. - May 23,24,25, 1949

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 112th Annual Convention, State Council of Pennsylvania Jr. Order, United American Mechanics, Easton, PA. - Sept. 16-17, 1971 ; 117th State Convention Jr. O.U.A.M. - Seven Springs Pennsylvania - Sept. 22,23,24, 1976 (2) ; 116th Annual Convention Grand Lodge - E.F. Johnson Grand Chancellor - August 22nd-24th, 1983 - Downingtown, PA. ; Jr. O.U.A.M. - 128th Annual Session, York, PA 1987 ; Schilling Adv. ; Jr. Order - United American Mechanics - 124th Annual Session - Sheraton Jet-Port - Sept. 15 & 16, 1983 ; 122nd - State Convention - Jr. O.U.A.M. - Altoona, PA - Sept. 16-18, 1981
